flawed_nl_solution:
Since Johnson got $2500, each part is therefore $2500/5 = $<<2500/5=5000>>5000
Mike will get 2*$5000 = $<<2*5000=10000>>10000
After buying the shirt he will have $10000-$200 = $<<10000-200=9800>>9800 left

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500.0, not 5000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
